issue.title: Installing from debs doesn't allow to use ign topic commands

content.raw:
I think this is a problem with the debian metadata that is not installing the yaml files in `/usr/share/ignition`

I think this was fixed in msgs3 but not in transport6 (note the missing line `usr/share/ignition/*`:

* #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-msgs3-release/src/18775007e607147d1ca021eaa279a5d46749a8db/ubuntu/debian/libignition-msgs-dev.install?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default
* #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-transport6-release/src/67c5897184b056e594aea03958436d1f476f099b/ubuntu/debian/libignition-transport-dev.install?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default
